items.name: ID_Detector_Search
items.label: جستجوي فرد براساس نام / نام خانوادگي

items.name: ID_Detector
items.label: انتخاب فرد
items.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, 'نام فرد را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT ID, CONCAT (System_Personal_Code," || ","كد ملي :",National_Code," || ",First_Name," ",Last_Name)
FROM PMT_TB110005
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and concat(First_Name," ",Last_Name) LIKE "%@#ID_Detector_Search%"

items.name: First_Name
items.label: نام
items.sql:
SELECT First_Name 
FROM PMT_TB110005
WHERE ID = '@#ID_Detector'

items.name: Last_Name
items.label: نام خانوادگي
items.sql:
SELECT Last_Name 
FROM PMT_TB110005
WHERE ID = '@#ID_Detector'

items.name: Personnel_Code
items.label: كد پرسنلي
items.sql:
SELECT Personnel_Code 
FROM PMT_TB110005
WHERE ID = '@#ID_Detector'

items.name: National_Code
items.label: كد ملي
items.sql:
SELECT National_Code 
FROM PMT_TB110005
WHERE ID = '@#ID_Detector'

items.name: Email
items.label: ايميل
items.sql:
SELECT Email 
FROM PMT_TB110005
WHERE ID = '@#ID_Detector'

items.name: Cell_Phone
items.label: تلفن همراه
items.sql:
SELECT Cell_Phone 
FROM PMT_TB110005
WHERE ID = '@#ID_Detector'

items.name: System_Personal_Code
items.label: كد سيستمي پرسنلي
items.sql:
SELECT System_Personal_Code 
FROM PMT_TB110005
WHERE ID = '@#ID_Detector'

items.name: Ext_Jobs_Finder
items.label: نمايش سمت براي فرد خارج سازمان

columns.name: Ext_ORG_Job_Code_Show
columns.label: كد شغل
columns.sql:
SELECT ORG_Job_Code 
FROM PMT_TB120014
WHERE IsActive = 1 
 and Ext_Int_ID = '@#Ext_Int_ID_Finder' 
 and System_Personal_Code = '@#Ext_System_Personal_Code_Finder'
 and ORG_Job_Code_Rank = '@#Ext_ORG_Job_Code_Rank_Finder'
columns.title: كد شغل

columns.name: Ext_ORG_Job_Title_Show
columns.label: عنوان شغل
columns.sql:
SELECT ORG_Job_Title 
FROM PMT_TB120014
WHERE IsActive = 1 
 and Ext_Int_ID = '@#Ext_Int_ID_Finder' 
 and System_Personal_Code = '@#Ext_System_Personal_Code_Finder'
 and ORG_Job_Code_Rank = '@#Ext_ORG_Job_Code_Rank_Finder'
columns.title: عنوان شغل

columns.name: Ext_Job_Type_Finder
columns.label: text_7
columns.sql:
SELECT Job_Type 
FROM PMT_TB120014
WHERE IsActive = 1 
 and Ext_Int_ID = '@#Ext_Int_ID_Finder' 
 and System_Personal_Code = '@#Ext_System_Personal_Code_Finder'
 and ORG_Job_Code_Rank = '@#Ext_ORG_Job_Code_Rank_Finder'
columns.title: text_7

items.title: نمايش سمت براي فرد خارج سازمان

items.title: نمايش سمت براي فرد داخل سازمان

items.name: Job_Counter
items.label: شمارنده تعداد شغل
items.sql:
SELECT COUNT(ID) 
FROM PMT_TB120014
WHERE IsActive = 1 
 and Ext_Int_ID = '@#Ext_Int_ID' 
 and System_Personal_Code = '@#System_Personal_Code'

items.name: Ext_Int_ID
items.label: داخلي / خارجي
items.sql:
SELECT Ext_Int_ID 
FROM PMT_TB110005
WHERE ID = '@#ID_Detector'
